name: Blade Runner
description:
This script will install "Blade Runner" CD edition for ScummVM.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions.
content:
game:
  game_id: bladerunner
  path: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert Blade Runner CD 1
    requires: cd1/outtake1.mix
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
    src: $DISC/cd1/
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
    src: $DISC/
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
    src: $DISC/cd1/coreanim.dat
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
    src: $DISC/cd1/mode.mix
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
    src: $DISC/cd1/music.mix
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
    src: $DISC/cd1/sfx.mix
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
    src: $DISC/cd1/spchsfx.mix
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Blade Runner/
    src: $DISC/cd1/startup.mix
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert Blade Runner CD 2
    requires: cd2/outtake2.mix
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert Blade Runner CD 3
    requires: cd3/outtake3.mix
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert Blade Runner CD 4
    requires: cd4/outtake4.mix
